description.value:
Aura 1

All creatures other than the dragon treat the area within the aura as difficult terrain. The dragon loses this aura while airborne.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Poison

Standard

Reach 2

+17 vs AC; 1d10+6 and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+17 vs AC; 1d8+6 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks

Recharge 5-6

Standard

The dragon flies up to 12 squares and makes a bite attack at any point during the move without provoking an opportunity attack from the target.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction, If An Adjacent Enemy Does Not Move On Its Turn, At-Will

+15 vs Reflex; 1d8+6 damage, and the target is knocked prone.

At-Will ✦ Charm, Gaze

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Range 10; +15 vs Will; the target slides 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Poison

Standard

Close blast 5

+15 vs Fortitude; 1d10+5 poison damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 poison damage and is slowed (save ends both). Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Poison

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +15 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

system.biography:
HP 620; Bloodied 310
Resist 20 poison 		Init +12 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 28Fort 25Ref 26Will 25
Speed 8, fly 12 (hover), overland flight 15
Ability ScoresStr 16 (+9)
Con 20 (+11)		Dex 22 (+12)
Int 16 (+9)		Wis 17 (+9)
Cha 20 (+11)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +21, Diplomacy +16, Insight +19, Intimidate +16Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 19 | Insight 29
